channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 6.2 million tune into Jimmy Kimmel's late-night return
item.description: "Jimmy Kimmel Live!" drew more than 6 million viewers in its return to the airwaves Tuesday night following a six-day suspension by Disney over his co...

item.title: "Best Friends Forever" Statue of Trump and Epstein removed from National Mall
item.description: A statue of President Trump holding Jeffrey Epstein's hand was removed from the National Mall in Washington, D.C., early Wednesday — one day after it ...

item.title: 1 detainee killed, 2 injured in shooting at Dallas ICE facility
item.description: One detainee is dead, and two more are in critical condition after a sniper opened fire on a Dallas Immigration and Customs Enforcement facility Wedne...

item.title: White House raises specter of mass firings if government shuts down
item.description: The White House is threatening to use a potential short-term spending lapse to make long-term changes to the federal workforce. Why it matters: Thousa...

item.title: Trump says Secret Service reviewing UN escalator, teleprompter, audio "sabotage"
item.description: President Trump said Wednesday the Secret Service is looking into "three very sinister events" at the United Nations concerning issues with an escalat...

item.title: Trump, Vance fault Democrats after shooting at Dallas ICE facility
item.description: Trump and Vance said Wednesday that the ICE shooting in Dallas was a consequence of what they characterized as a rhetorical assault on law enforcement...

item.title: Harris distances herself from Biden as book tour begins amid pro-Palestinian protests
item.description: Divisions in the Democratic Party over Israel policy dogged former vice president Kamala Harris’s presidential campaign.

item.title: Trump’s blast toward Russia is a ‘negotiating tactic,’ White House says
item.description: The president’s escalation in rhetoric is a marker of Trump’s frustration toward Russian President Vladimir Putin, according to a senior White House o...

item.title: Trump’s U.N. General Assembly moments that didn’t go as planned
item.description: The White House said a broken escalator and teleprompter could be evidence of sabotage. The U.N. suggested the mishaps might have been due to Trump’s ...

item.title: Trump unveils wall of presidents, with an autopen standing in for Biden
item.description: A White House official said that all presidents are featured, displayed in chronological order, starting with George Washington and going up to Donald...

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
